title: Gather Your Allies
content: Cazador's Dungeon, allow Astarion to complete the ritual to become a Vampire Ascendant. Retinue of the Vampire Lord: Summon 2 Shadows, 2 Giant Skeletons, a Ghast, a Shadow Mastiff and a Werewolf. Inspector Valeria: Complete the full Murder Mystery story arc in Act 3 and keep him alive in the Murder Tribunal. The Watch: summon 3x great weapon fighters at level 10. One half-orc, one gold dwarf, and one asmodeus tiefling. Jaheira's Harpers: Complete Jaheira's The High Harper quest chain. Silver Ha
